name: domq-epflsti
author: domq
summary: ssh from anywhere to anywhere in the Puppet cluster

dependencies.name: puppetlabs-concat
dependencies.__comment: This is actually an indirect dependency of https://github.com/jlyheden/puppet-tinyproxy which is not (yet) released on Puppet Forge. Except that jlyheden's tinyproxy uses an old (pre-puppetlabs takeover) of that module, so the version_requirement is just the latest version du jour at the time I'm writing this.
dependencies.__more_comment: Commenting a JSON file considered harmful, hence this here workaround - See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/244777/can-i-comment-a-json-file
